correctedFormulas.note: Formulas corregidas basadas en pinaculo-spreadsheet.csv - PPT CLASE 1 es la fuente autorizada

corrections.H: Corrected from G + I to A + C (Tu destino)
corrections.I: Corrected from C + D to E + F + G (Inconsciente)
corrections.J: Corrected from H + I to D + H (Mi espejo)
corrections.O: Corrected from M + N to M + K + L (Inconsciente negativo)
corrections.Y: Added A + B + C + D + X (Misión)
corrections.Z: Added last 2 digits of year (Regalo divino)
